title: Pixel VoLTE issue with Airtel
content:
Google must mention on every pixel handset box that works with only JIO sim for VoLTE services.
Don't make the customers fool.
I got the information from Airtel technical support that they got a mail from Google device team that the Pixel users with Airtel connection are not able to use VoLTE service because MCC & MNC is missing at IMS end & Google device team is working on it to resolve the issue.
But Google is giving false excuse to pixel users that the problem is from carrier end & we must complaint airtel for this.
Don't give wrong information.
